stable.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
stable.bodyMarkdown:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`4e9ead4`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4e9ead45ca7eb3a98436194a19a9d275f75b8a47) - **switch-row**: minor ui improvement *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`892dbed`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/892dbedeaef79bf4c382be8050930f07dee960d9) - **update-sheet**: improve version name visibility *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`84dba4f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/84dba4f86adf973f7a0326981c0909be94e8fe09) - **settings**: rename `Map thumbnails` to `Maps` *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`f37a3dd`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f37a3ddc315a0cc531173edfdc429b566cba9fba) - **map-list**: add horizontally scrollable pager *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`460426e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/460426ec483ff7e6eea8b76e9edee3bf4c29d69d) - **l10n**: update translations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`e7f6637`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/e7f6637f7d0ff2bc1a307926b1c84ac587477208) - draw behind navigation bar in landscape mode *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`31f06db`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/31f06db3af2d7a83ea35899c5595f312b0e8f83d) - disable large top bar on compact height *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`29c1d5a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/29c1d5a1e66e6f0d39a54a09344e71188effd42f) - apply navigation bar padding in all screens *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

preRelease.body:
‚Ä¢ Shizuku support
‚Ä¢ Full support for scoped storage & folder configuration
‚Ä¢ New map list with searching and sorting options
‚Ä¢ Multi-selection and batch actions for maps
‚Ä¢ Show thumbnail of chosen map
‚Ä¢ Quickly open/download maps from .zip files and URLs
‚Ä¢ Improved UI for wide screens and RTL layouts
‚Ä¢ Various UI improvements
‚Ä¢ Various bug fixes
‚Ä¢ Monochrome icon
preRelease.bodyMarkdown:
### ‚ú® New Features
- [`4e9ead4`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/4e9ead45ca7eb3a98436194a19a9d275f75b8a47) - **switch-row**: minor ui improvement *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`892dbed`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/892dbedeaef79bf4c382be8050930f07dee960d9) - **update-sheet**: improve version name visibility *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`84dba4f`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/84dba4f86adf973f7a0326981c0909be94e8fe09) - **settings**: rename `Map thumbnails` to `Maps` *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`f37a3dd`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/f37a3ddc315a0cc531173edfdc429b566cba9fba) - **map-list**: add horizontally scrollable pager *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`460426e`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/460426ec483ff7e6eea8b76e9edee3bf4c29d69d) - **l10n**: update translations *(commit by @aliernfrog)*

### üêõ Bug Fixes
- [`e7f6637`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/e7f6637f7d0ff2bc1a307926b1c84ac587477208) - draw behind navigation bar in landscape mode *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`31f06db`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/31f06db3af2d7a83ea35899c5595f312b0e8f83d) - disable large top bar on compact height *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
- [`29c1d5a`](https://github.com/aliernfrog/pf-tool/commit/29c1d5a1e66e6f0d39a54a09344e71188effd42f) - apply navigation bar padding in all screens *(commit by @aliernfrog)*
